ghostrunner.title: Ghost Runner
ghostrunner.menu.order.name: Name
ghostrunner.message.delete_ghost: Are you sure you want to delete this ghost?
ghostrunner.message.ghosts_select_limit: Same version, same seed, no more than 4 Ghosts active.
ghostrunner.message.checkpoint_new: A new point has been reached.
ghostrunner.message.not_registered_api_k: Speedrun.com API Key not specified. You must proceed after registration.
ghostrunner.message.guide.api_key.title: API Key Registration Guide
ghostrunner.message.guide.api_key:
1. Login to Speedrun.com
2. Click on your profile, then go to the "Settings" page
3. Click the "API Key" tab
4. Copy and paste the API Key (random character) on the page
ghostrunner.message.failed_submit_record: The record submit failed cause by an error.
ghostrunner.message.not_need_seed_descri: You don't need to enter a seed in the description. (will be submitted automatically)
ghostrunner.message.submit.not_own_ghost: You can't submit it because it's not your Ghost.
ghostrunner.message.submit.already_submi: You can't submit it because it has already been submitted.
ghostrunner.message.update.found_new_upd:
A new update for
GhostRunner has been found.
ghostrunner.message.update.unknown: Failed to get latest version of information.
ghostrunner.message.update.updated: You are using the latest version of GhostRunner.
ghostrunner.message.update.outdated: A new version of GhostRunner has been found.
ghostrunner.world.is_fsg.description: If you are using FSG seeds, enable it.
ghostrunner.option.toggle_point_notifica: At a specific point, the time comparison between Ghost and My Run is notified as a message.
